Policy

Privacy Policy

Effective date: February 2, 2026 · Company: Mainstreet AI, LLC

This Privacy Policy explains how Mainstreet AI, LLC (“Mainstreet AI”, “we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you visit our websites or use our members area.

Information we collect

  • Information you provide: for example, your email address if you contact us or subscribe to updates.
  • Account information: if you use the members area, we may process authentication/session information to sign you in.
  • Usage data: basic technical data such as IP address, device/browser information, and pages accessed (typically via server logs).
  • Cookies: we use essential cookies where needed to operate the site (for example, to keep you signed in). If we enable analytics later, we may also use analytics cookies.

How we use information

  • Operate, maintain, and secure our sites and services
  • Provide authentication and account-related functionality
  • Respond to messages and support requests
  • Send updates if you subscribe (you can unsubscribe anytime)
  • Improve our content and offerings
  • Comply with legal obligations

How we share information

We may share information with service providers that help us run our business (for example, hosting, authentication, and email/newsletter delivery). We do not sell your personal information.

Your choices

  • Unsubscribe: you can unsubscribe from emails using the link in the message.
  • Access / deletion requests: contact us at info@mainstreetai.com.
  • Cookies: your browser may let you delete or block cookies, but some features (like sign-in) may stop working.

Retention & security

We retain information for as long as needed to provide our services, meet legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. We take reasonable measures to protect information, but no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

Children’s privacy

Our sites and services are not directed to children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

Changes

We may update this policy from time to time. We’ll update the effective date above when we do.

Newsletter note

If you subscribe to emails from us, the emails you receive will include the required sender information and a physical mailing address in the footer.
